title: I organized and led the QubitHub x IBM Qiskit Fall Fest 2025
Co-founder of the Quantum Science Gateway

I participated as a mentor in the BeyondQuantum: Introduction to Quantum and Research program ( https://thinkingbeyond.education/beyondquantum/ ). Here is the project I supervised with a group of students: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hsidRznSqqU

I organized and led the first Mexican quantum computing workshop in Mexico. The event is registered at https://quantum2025.org/iyq-event/laop-qubithub-a-quantum-computing-workshop/ . Recordings are available at https://zenodo.org/communities/laop_qubithub_aquantumcomputingworkshop .
Research adviser on developing a Project Proposal on quantum mechanics and quantum computing, basic awareness, learning, and importance in the Chicago Hope for Kids program.

Organizing Committee Member for the International Latin American Optics & Photonics (LAOP) 2024 Workshop, Puerto Vallarta, Mexico. Recordings of interviews with some speakers are available at https://zenodo.org/records/15021419

International Committee Members of the Fourth International Conference on Advanced Optics and Photonics Research in Engineering (AOPR 2024), Wuhan, China. https://spie.org/Publications/Proceedings/Volume/13260
